com.luke.lukef.lukeapp.tools

Class LukeNetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.luke.lukef.lukeapp.tools.LukeNetUtils

  • public class LukeNetUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for interaction with the Luke backend. Needs to be intsantiated, unlike LukeUtils, since context is required for most network operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  LukeNetUtils.FetchUserDataTask
      Fetches user data like ID, image and URL from the server.

                                      java.lang.InterruptedException

        Returns:

      • getNewestLink

        public Link getNewestLink()

      • imageSetupTask

        public static void imageSetupTask(android.widget.ImageView imageViewToSet,
                                  java.lang.String url,
                                  int defaultImageId,
                                  android.app.Activity activity)
        Method for asynchronously fetching an image from the internet and setting it into an imageView. Allows bigger image download to not pause the app.
        Parameters:
        imageViewToSet - ImageView where the image will be set
        url - Url of the image as a String
        defaultImageId - Default image id, in case the online image is unavailable
        activity - Activity that can run setting the imageView on a UiThread
